posts.post_content:
Selling two incomplete Piedmont Cigarettes sleeves. Sleeves are missing ends and are well worn. One sleeve has a complete, albeit, cut in three, tax stamp with the 1910 date. Asking $sold for both, shipped. PPFF or add 3%. 
Thanks.

Michael
[url]fiveelgins@gmail.com[/url]
Very cool. If you happen to come across more like this in the future, I would be interested.
